original_text: Also, if a wicked person stops doing bad things and he starts to do things that are good and right, he will continue to live. He deserves to live because he has changed.
korean_text: 만일 악인이 돌이켜 그 악에서 떠나 정의와 공의대로 행하면 그가 그로 말미암아 살리라

sentences.original_text: Also, if a wicked person stops doing bad things
and he starts to do things that are good and right
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 선하고 옳은 일들을 하기 시작하면

sentences.original_text: He deserves to live because he has changed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 변화했기 때문에 살 자격이 있습니다
